text: The Whistle Blower is a 1986 British spy thriller movie directed by Simon Langton and was based on the 1984 novel by John Hale. It stars Michael Caine, Felicity Dean, John Gielgud, Nigel Havers, James Fox, Kenneth Colley, Gordon Jackson, Barry Foster, David Langton, Mark Powley. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 thriller movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:British spy movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Simon Langton Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies about whistleblowing
title: The Whistle Blower
